lead_paragraph: Buying shares of Kohlberg Kravis Roberts or Apollo Global Management is inherently riskier than investing in a private equity fund directly.
snippet: Buying shares of Kohlberg Kravis Roberts or Apollo Global Management is inherently riskier than investing in a private equity fund directly.

headline.main: No Confetti as Apollo and K.K.R Move to List
headline.seo: Kohlberg Kravis and Apollo Limp to Market
